reviews.text: Very basic station with hardly any street lighting on the approach footpaths / particularly on the side of the Leeds bound platform

The same stuff happens just like in Morley,the station only Has 2 platforms same as Morley and batley even though it does have kinda of good connections with dewsbury,manchester Victoria,huddersfield and Leeds

Very convenient for me as I only live 2-3 minutes walk away. What I dislike (that's putting mildly!) is only having one bloody train per hour most of the day! ALL Northern services should call here in both directions. I've complained to Northern and Metro, but they say they can't do anything about it. That is simply utter bollocks! There's plenty of spare time to add a stop at Cottingley. On a Sunday we only get one train every two hours - hideous! But I have been informed this will go every hour Leeds-Huddersfield-Manchester Victoria all stations in December.
